thread.title: UT Rocket Basketball Season Tickets on sale for as low as $80
thread.title_full: UT Rocket Basketball Season Tickets on sale for as low as $80

author: 13abc
title: UT Rocket Basketball Season Tickets on sale for as low as $80
text:
Related Links UT Rockets TOLEDO, Ohio (13abc Action News) - The University of Toledo Athletic Department today announced that season tickets for both men’s and women’s basketball are on sale. Season ticket plans are available in all areas and can be purchased for as low as $80.
Men’s Basketball season tickets run from $210 for premium locations in the lower level of Savage Arena to $80 for selected seats in sections 202-06 of the upper east side of the arena. Elite reserved season tickets for Women’s Basketball are $135 in sections 108, 109 and the first five rows of section 102 and 103. All other seating for women’s Basketball is general admission and is $80 for a season ticket.
Full-time UT Employees may purchase up to two season tickets at half price. Additional season tickets may be purchased at the full price. UT Employees may purchase season tickets by calling 419-530-GOLD (4653), visiting the UT Athletic Ticket Office, or mailing in an order form (no online orders). UT Employee orders must include your Rocket number, department/campus, and contact information. UT Employees have the option of paying for tickets with MC/VISA, cash, check or by payroll deduction. Payroll deduction is deducted in six equal payments.
Loge seating, club seating and court-side seating are also available. For more information on these options, please contact the Athletic Development Office at 419-530-4183.
The UT men’s team is coming off its second straight 20-win season in 2014-15. The Rockets return two starters from last year’s team, senior center Nathan Boothe and junior guard Jonathan Williams, as well as two key reserves, junior guard Jordan Lauf and sophomore guard Stuckey Moseley. Head coach Tod Kowalczyk will also be adding seven newcomers to the lineup this season.
Head Coach Tricia Cullop welcomes back six players who started at least 10 games for the UT women’s team last year, including sophomore guard Jay-Ann Bravo-Harriott, who was the 2014-15 MAC Freshman of the Year.
Rocket fans will get their first look at both teams in a free exhibition doubleheader on Saturday, Nov. 7. The women host Findlay at noon while the men play Hillsdale at 2:30 p.m. The regular season opens up on Nov. 14 in a doubleheader on Saturday, Nov. 14. The women host Arizona of the PAC-12 at noon and the men face West Virginia Tech at 2:30.
For more information or to purchase season tickets, visit the UT Athletic Ticket Office at the Sullivan Athletic Complex in Savage Arena, contact the UT Athletic Ticket Office at 419-530-GOLD (4653) or go online at UTrockets.com.
